a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Inequality-adjusted Human Development Index vs. Human
The Human Development Index (HDI) is a summary measure of key dimensions of human development: a long and healthy
life, a good education, and a decent standard of living. The Inequality-adjusted Human Development Index (IHDI) is adjusted
Data source: UNDP, Human Development Report (2021-22) (2022)
